short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The profile picture guard will keep your profile picture safe online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What does the profile picture guard do?
The Facebook profile picture guard will make the fb profile picture shield on your fb profile picture.

Note: The Extension does not work when the profile is locked.also does not work on iphone.
You need internet connexion. And your fb account must be logged in on the browser.
To check the profile picture guard you need to use android device or use this link : https://mbasic.facebook.com/profile.php
or click the button "Check if it works!" on the extension page.

Need help? Contact me :
